channel.title: Quest Cape Problem

item.title: Quest Cape Problem
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:3, topic:343257”]that checks if the quest aint 0; so if they start all quests they can wear it.
try this

if(wearID == 2740 && q1 == 15 && q2 == 15 && q3 == 15 && q4 == 15 && q5 == 15 && q6 == 15 && q7 == 15 && q8 == 15 && q9 == 15 && q10 == 15 && q11 == 15){ sM("You must have completed every Quest available to equip this cape."); return false; }
@Oh-Noes: conventions please :)[/quote]

That will make it so if you have every quest completed, you cannot wear the cape. Replace all '&&'s with '||'s and '=='s with '!='s.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Cape Problem
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

I know that, but I’m a bit tired so I just copied the original code and used that. I use conventions in my own code, it’s up to them if they want to.

Also, just realised it should use or statements, not and, or the restriction will only apply when a player has every quest incomplete. If they start one, they could wear the cape as it is.

if(wearID == 2740 && (q1 != 15 || q2 != 15 || q3 != 15 || q4 != 15 || q5 != 15 || q6 != 15 || q7 != 15 || q8 != 15 || q9 != 15 || q10 != 15 || q11 != 15)){ sM("You must have completed every Quest available to equip this cape."); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Cape Problem
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

As it is, all the code does is send a message and not actually stop them from wearing the item.

if(wearID == 2740 && q1 != 0 && q2 != 0 && q3 != 0 && q4 != 0 && q5 != 0 && q6 != 0 && q7 != 0 && q8 != 0 && q9 != 0 && q10 != 0 && q11 != 0){ sM("You must complete every Quest to equip this."); return false; }
Should solve that.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Cape Problem
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

Hello i want to make my quest cape need every quest i added i used this code

if(wearID == 2740 && q1 != 0 && q2 != 0 && q3 != 0 && q4 != 0 && q5 != 0 && q6 != 0 && q7 != 0 && q8 != 0 && q9 != 0 && q10 != 0 && q11 != 0){ sM("You must complete every Quest to equip this."); }

Any help please??
